    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Administrator
    Represents an Administrator user with capabilities to manage staff and inventory.
    Appointment
    Represents an appointment in the system, storing details such as date, time, status, and prescribed medicines.
    AppointmentManager
    Manages all appointment-related operations including scheduling, updating, and retrieving appointments.
    Billing
    Handles billing operations, including calculating total bills and generating invoices for appointments.
    Doctor
    Represents a Doctor user with capabilities to manage appointments and patient records.
    Inventory
    Manages the inventory of medicines.
    Invoice
    Represents an invoice for a patient's appointment, including consultation fees, medicines, and total cost.
    Main
    Main application class for the Hospital Management System (HMS).
    MedicalRecord
    Represents the medical records of a patient.
    MedicalRecord.MedicalRecordEntry
    Nested class representing a single medical record entry.
    Medicine
    Represents a medicine in the inventory, including details such as ID, name, stock, threshold, and price.
    Patient
    Represents a patient in the hospital management system.
    Pharmacist
    Represents a Pharmacist who manages prescriptions, dispenses medicines, handles inventory replenishment requests, and monitors stock levels.
    Reception
    Represents a Receptionist in the hospital management system.
    Specialisation
    Represents various specializations for medical staff and doctors.
    Staff
    Abstract class representing a staff member in the system.
    TimeSlot
    Represents a time slot for appointments, including its date, start and end time, and availability status.
    TimeSlot.SlotStatus
    Enum representing the status of a time slot.
    User
    Represents a generic user in the system.
    UserInterface
    Interface defining essential methods for user management.
    ValidationUtils
    A utility class for validating common input formats such as email addresses and contact numbers in the Hospital Management System.
